name: Seribu Rasa
description: Inspired by the region`s culinary wealth, Seribu Rasa (One Thousand Flavors) offers delectable local dishes and seafood that embody the richness of Southeast Asian and Indonesian Flavors. Each traditional recipe is prepared with the freshest ingredients and refined by our Chef`s culinary skills, bringing our customers to fascinating gastronomic journey of “One Thousand Flavors”.

menu.name: Tongseng Kambing Brebes
menu.description: Lamb stewed with traditional spices and hint of sweet soy sauce

menu.name: Oriental Seafood Cakwe
menu.description: Fried traditional Chinese dough filled with ground squid and prawn, glazed with sweet and sour sauce

menu.name: Udang Gulung Tempo Doeloe
menu.description: Fried oriental style prawn cake served with Chef's special mayonnaise dressing

menu.name: Es Dawet Ndoro Putri
menu.description: Classic ice dawet added with sweet red bean dressed with premium homemade durian jam
